General.Name: Companias CIC SA
General.Description: Companias CIC S.A. designs, produces, and markets furniture and decoration products in Chile. It offers beds and mattresses; pillows; linens, such as bed sheets, blankets and accessories, and cover beds and quilts; pillows; bases; sofas; dining room furniture; and bedroom, living room, and other furniture. The company was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: Avenida Esquina Blanca Nº 960, Santiago de Chile, Chile
